missing.game.items.nonmovable

Class Bag

  • java.lang.Object
    • missing.game.items.Item
      • missing.game.items.nonmovable.NonMovable
        • missing.game.items.nonmovable.Container
          • missing.game.items.nonmovable.Bag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WorldTile.TileObject

    public class Bag
extends Container
    This represents the player's bag. Each player has their own bag. Should not be displayed on the GUI Window. The Bag can contain 20 items of any size. The size of the bag can be increased.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
